# Complaint Management System - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack complaint management system with AI-powered chatbot and automated email routing.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: React, Tailwind CSS, Google OAuth
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express, Gemini API, Nodemailer
- **Features**: Landing page, chatbot interface, department classification, automated emails

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Node.js/Express server
- `/frontend` - React application

## Setup Steps
- [x] Create project structure
- [ ] Scaffold backend
- [ ] Scaffold frontend
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Configure environment variables
- [ ] Test and verify
